Feature.Name: Major Property
Feature.Text: The artifact imprisons a death slaad (see the Monster Manual). Each time you use one of the artifact's properties as an action, the slaad has a 10 percent chance of escaping, whereupon it appears within 15 feet of you and attacks you.
